meanings.definition: Factices: artificial substances used in place of natural materials
meanings.sent1: The artist used factices to create a realistic-looking tree for the set.
meanings.sent2: The factices in the makeup products make them last longer.
meanings.sent3: The factices in the cake made it look like a giant mushroom!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like factices, hiding the true emotions underneath.
meanings.sent5: The factices in the sculpture gave it a lifelike appearance.

meanings.definition: Factices: something made or done artificially, especially in imitation of something natural
meanings.sent1: The counterfeit flowers were factices meant to mimic real blooms.
meanings.sent2: The factices in the movie set made the jungle scene seem real.
meanings.sent3: The factices in the garden gnome made it look like it was winking.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sounded like factices, lacking genuine joy.
meanings.sent5: The factices in the painting added depth and texture to the artwork.
